definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 You3 xian4 Xin1 wen2 Wang3

sentences.english: CATV signals travel strightyly high up into the space from TV stations.
sentences.chinese: 有线电视信号从电视台直接送入空间。

sentences.english: They involved the purchase of cable television stations.
sentences.chinese: 他们卷入了购买有线电视台的问题。

sentences.english: Comes mounted on Nomad 2 shelf, with pre-wired fuse.
sentences.chinese: 来自游牧2货架上，与前有线保险丝。

sentences.english: A bridge will simply send packets from the wire to the wireless and back.
sentences.chinese: 网桥仅仅在有线网和无线网之间传递数据包。

sentences.english: What we see here does not add up to traditional Corded Ware cultural norms.
sentences.chinese: 我们在这所看到的并不等于传统的有线窑文化规范。

sentences.english: Introduced the designs and implementation plans of Maanshan CATV broadband data network.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马鞍山有线宽带数据网的设计与组网方案。

sentences.english: Introduce the idea and project of CATV fibre-optical netting in urban and rural areas in Ninghua.
sentences.chinese: 介绍宁化县城乡有线电视光纤联网设计思想和方案。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a remote meter -reading system based on CATV broad band network.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于有线电视宽带网的远方抄表系统。

sentences.english: The pre-wired, location aware, infrastructure makes change simple.
sentences.chinese: 前有线，位置清楚，基础设施作出改变简单。

sentences.english: In this respect, think of it as cable television without the need for a set-top-box.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，可以把它看作不需要机顶盒的有线电视。

sentences.english: Just use a wired headset or the speakerphone function,” she said.
sentences.chinese: 使用有线耳机或扩音器功能，就能达到预防目的。

sentences.english: Kevlar fiber helps to strengthen the cable and prevent breakage.
sentences.chinese: 芳纶纤维有助于增强有线和防止破损。

sentences.english: He met K'naan when they worked on a cable TV show together.
sentences.chinese: 在一次为有线电视节目工作时，他认识了克南。

sentences.english: They can have TVs, but no cable.
sentences.chinese: 可以有电视，但是没有有线服务。

sentences.english: Cable broadcasting and television system operator.
sentences.chinese: 有线广播电视系统经营者。

sentences.english: They also face the challenge of competing against more risque fare available on cable channels, such as HBO.
sentences.chinese: 他们也面临与有线电视频道上更多所带来的挑战。

definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
